newsitem.title: USA: U.S. barges quoted at mostly lower levels.
newsitem.headline: U.S. barges quoted at mostly lower levels.

text.p: U.S. barge rates were quoted at mostly lower levels on the St. Louis Merchants Exchange call session. No barges traded Tuesday versus two Monday.
- Two barges, this week, mid-Mississippi offered five points lower at 215 percent of tariff, no bid.
- One barge, this week, Mississippi (St. Louis) offered five points higher at 190 percent, no bid.
- Two barges, next week, Illinois River bid 7-1/2 points lower at 205 percent, offered at 215 percent.
- Two barges, next week, mid-Mississippi bid 7-1/2 points lower at 210 percent, offered at 220 percent.
- Two barges, next week, lower Ohio, bid 2-1/2 points lower at 205 percent, no offer.
- Two barges, one each weeks of Nov 3 and 10, mid-Mississippi (McGregor and south) bid at 210 percent, offered at 220 percent versus previous trade at 220 percent.
- Eight barges, two each week April, offered at a steady 170 percent, bid at 155 percent.
